content: antuco by amy christoffers savory knitting amy christoffers all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 5/9/14 © fairmount fibers ltd 2014 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit 2014q page 1 of 3 sizes abbreviations circumference 27 49 72 bobble bind off height 9 bor beginning of round cowl shown measures 27 co cast on k knit materials ndl needle manos del uruguay maxima 100% extrafine merino round s round s approx 100g/218 yds 1 2 3 skip p purl shown in #m2031 saffron pm place marker st s stitch es us 7/4 5mm ndl 24 40 40 circular or size needed to obtain gauge stitch guide stitch markers k2 p2 rib multiple of 4 sts tapestry needle round 1 *k1 p2 k1 repeat from * repeat round 1 for pattern gauge 16 sts and 32 rnds= 4 in basketweave pattern worked basketweave pattern multiple of 4 sts in rnds also see chart round 1 *p1 k2 p1 repeat from * rnds 2 and 5 knit rnds 3 and 4 *k1 p2 k1 repeat from * round 6 repeat round 1 repeat rnds 1 6 for pattern all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 5/9/14 © fairmount fibers ltd 2014 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit 2014q page 2 of 3 instructions work rnds 1 6 of basketweave patt 6 times cowl co 108 196 288 sts pm for bor and join to work in the work in k2 p2 rib for 1 round being careful not to twist sts bobble all sts loosely in rib work in k2 p2 rib until piece measures 3½ from cast-on finishing edge weave in ends block gently to preserve the texture basketweave chart 5 3 1 knit purl pattern repeat all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 5/9/14 © fairmount fibers ltd 2014 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit 2014q page 3 of 3
